description:
http://anidb.net/ch26380 [Yasuna]`s mother Ajimu Tamaki runs an import good store named "Ka Makani" (Hawaiian for "Wind") that includes a video rental service. Her husband Shougo is pilot of an international airline (and he hasn`t been home for three months so he never occurs in this story).
Being aware of the consequences of Yasuna`s relation to http://anidb.net/ch26383 [Yuuma] in the past she encourages the relation between her daughter and http://anidb.net/ch26379 [Hirosuke].
name: Ajimu Tamaki
